about_the_game:
Follow the Sword Of Mejor as it travels from kingdom to kingdom. It all starts with an adventurer finding it buried in the ruins, and it's up to your choices to decide what happens next.

The usual "multiple endings" gameplay style brought to the entire game! Keep the initial adventurer alive, equip him with the Sword Of Mejor, and follow his adventure. Or sacrifice him in a fight against the Goblins to embark on a new journey with your Goblin party!

A unique upgrade system where you upgrade the Sword of Mejor based on the character who is currently equipped with it, as well as a normal character leveling system.

Key Features

  • Turn based combat

  • Countless characters to play as

  • Too many endings, middles, and beginnings

  • Upgrade system

Some of the journeys the Sword Of Mejor will follow...

The Adventurer

Unknowingly the first to find the Sword of Mejor. Help him survive and continue on his quest of discovering Rex's Emerald, a mythical stone with magical powers. Discover vast lands and recruit Humans, Goblins, Orcs, Shades, and more to help him fight. Once news spreads that the Sword Of Mejor has been found, everyone will be trying to get their hands on it!

The Goblin King

Help The Goblin King defend the goblin village from the Orcs in the Great Goblin & Orc War. The Sword of Mejor will decide the fate of each battle!

The Goblin Shopkeeper

While everyone else wants the Sword Of Mejor for themselves, the only thing the Gobin Shopkeeper is interested in is finding the highest bidder. Join him on his quest to get rich!

The Orc Raiders

The other side of the Great Goblin & Orc War, once the Orc Raiders get their hands on the Sword Of Mejor, nothing will stop them from letting go of it... besides death.

The Village Of Paz

A small remote Human village, not far from where the Adventurer found the Sword Of Mejor in the ruins. Some say it was originally forged by a master smith centuries ago by members of the Village Of Paz. Discover the Sword Of Mejor's rich past and why it must be kept away from everyone, including its creator...

More paths will be in final release, but the above are all able to be started in the FREE demo!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel N4100 (or similar) or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A unique rpg experience where you follow the path of a sword, rather than 1 set character! Follow the Sword of Mejor as it travels the lands swapping hands through battles, trades, gifts and more! With more paths and endings to count, every playthrough is different!
